arts.ttl: Luton endure successive relegations following West Brom thumping
arts.sum: The Hatters are only the fourth club to suffer that fate.

arts.ttl: Luton suffer back-to-back relegations after West Brom loss
arts.sum: Luton have become only the fourth team to suffer back-to-back relegations from the Premier League all the way to League One after a 5-3 defeat at West Brom.

arts.ttl: West Brom lead Luton but Hatters instantly equalise through superb Alli effort
arts.sum: Millenic Alli finds a vital equaliser for Luton at the Hawthorns after Tom Fellows gave the home side the lead.

arts.ttl: ‘It’s possible’ – Luton Town survival prediction shared by club favourite ahead of West Brom trip
